name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Charles COLEY, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Charles COLEY, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 12th day of December, 2007, the Motion to Allow Nunc Pro Tunc Amendment to Allowance of Appeal and the Petition for Allowance of Appeal are hereby DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
938 A.2d 982
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Charles COLEY, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 12, 2007.
